description: Try our easy to follow Hot Smoked Grain Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Hot Smoked Grain Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 150 g Tassal Hot smoked salmon with cracked pepper, flaked
250 g precooked microwave ancient grains mix

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon grains onto a sharing plate and top with the avocado quarters and flaked salmon. Serve with lemon wedges.
